page.title: 14SHOPPING IN FENCE
page.content: {POST OFFICE.}MR.JORDAN GOT THE POST OFFICE WITH HIS COMPENSATION WHEN A SHUTTLECOCK IN A BADMINTON GAME HIT HIM AND BLINDED HIM IN 1 EYE. IT SELLS STAMPS,MAGS,PAPERS,SWEETS ,GREETINGS CARDS,GLUE,SELLOTAPE,FROZEN FOOD.IT'S OPEN MON 9.00_5.30PM,TUES 9.00_1.30,WED_FRI 9.00_5.30PM. {VILLAGE SHOP (OFF LICENCE)}IT SELLS BEER,SPIRITS ETC.SWEETS,CIGARETTES, TINNED FOOD,PIES AND GENERAL HOUSEOLD GOODS.IT'S OPEN MON_SAT 9.00_9.00PM. {FENCE IN PENDLE BAKERY.}THE CAKES FOR THE BAKERY WERE MADE IN BURNLEY,BUT NOW THEY ARE MADE IN THE SHOP.IT SELLS CAKES,BREAD ETC,FRUIT & VEG,TINNED FOOD,CIGARRETTS,CHOCOLATE.OPEN MON_FRI 9.00_6.00,SAT9.00AM_12.00PM. THERE ARE{NO OTHER SHOPS}APART FROM THE GIFT SHOP AND THE PUBS. PEOPLE HAVE TO GO TO NELSON OR BURNLEY FOR MOST OF THEIR SHOPPING.
